name: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-TX30 Shock & Waterproof Digital Camera (Pink) with 16GB Card + Battery + Case + Floating Strap + Tripod + Accessory Kit

reviews.name: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-TX30 Shock & Waterproof Digital Camera (Pink) with 16GB Card + Battery + Case + Floating Strap + Tripod + Accessory Kit
reviews.reviewText:
The NP-BN1 is a good rechargeable battery pack for a good SONY CyberShot.
Sony makes very good equipment and accessories.
I enjoy and will always trust and use SONY !
Regards,
Mark Photographer
reviews.title: Good rechargeable battery pack

reviews.name: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-TX30 Shock & Waterproof Digital Camera (Pink) with 16GB Card + Battery + Case + Floating Strap + Tripod + Accessory Kit
reviews.reviewText: you can find the exact same batteries on auction sites for as little as $4 each! why pay an extra $40, just because a brand name is on it?
reviews.title: 04 August 2011

reviews.name: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-TX30 Shock & Waterproof Digital Camera (Pink) with 16GB Card + Battery + Case + Floating Strap + Tripod + Accessory Kit
reviews.reviewText:
Specifically purchased this Sony Battery for my Cybershot at ridiculous cost. Sony claims it lasts up to 240 shots. Luck if I can get more than 2 days of life and 30 shots out of one charge.
Extremely dissatisfied.
Strongly recommend to purchase another camera brand and save yourself the aggravation.
reviews.title: terrible performance

reviews.name: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-TX30 Shock & Waterproof Digital Camera (Pink) with 16GB Card + Battery + Case + Floating Strap + Tripod + Accessory Kit
reviews.reviewText: My wife used it a couple times to try it out and it takes great pictures. She used it once under water and it hasn't worked since. We followed the directions to a tee, but after the use in water, it never worked again. Now I have the same camera (black) and used it (in the water) the sad n e time she did and mine still works. Haven't heard from anybody if they'll repair or replace. Buyer be ware.
reviews.title: It only works 1 time

reviews.name: Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-TX30 Shock & Waterproof Digital Camera (Pink) with 16GB Card + Battery + Case + Floating Strap + Tripod + Accessory Kit
reviews.reviewText: I had the old Sony Cyber-Shot and liked it!....But this one is wonderful and water proof! Amazing the upgrades from my old one purchased in 2004 and it was 3 times the price of my new one!
reviews.title: Love the COLOR!
